description: From square root of Riemann zeta function: form Dirichlet series Sum b_n/n^s whose square is zeta function; sequence gives denominator of b_n.
mathematica: b[1] = 1; b[n_] := b[n] = (dn = Divisors[n]; c = 1;Do[c = c - b[dn[[i]]]*b[n/dn[[i]]], {i, 2, Length[dn] - 1}]; c/2); a[n_] := Denominator[b[n]]; a /@ Range[78] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 04 2011, after Maple version *)
crossrefs: See A046643 for more details. See also A046645.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
